Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory136.png'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Up next is our main event!'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'One-day romance!'}
{3: 'The ballroom is instantly filled with clapping and cheering.'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Are you still exhausted from overworking? Are you still worried that you're too busy to find a date?"}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Today's gala is going to pair up our commandants with a date for a one-day romance! Don't give up your shot!"}
{2: 'Sounds interesting.', 4: 'Why would they do something like that?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'One-day romance?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "(Contemplates) So that's what the commandants do at their gatherings...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't overthink this, Bianca.", 3: '13', 4: "This is the first time I've seen it!", 5: '13'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I do understand why. After all, humans have this insatiable need to socialize, unlike us Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I used to enjoy having companions as well, once.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You still can.', 3: '16', 4: "Is that so... I can't imagine what that Bianca was like.", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's not how a Purifying Force member should act, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm not like you... Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Your squad is... more... "human."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Despite its many drawbacks and mistakes, sometimes I do envy the fact that it has made you such a respected leader.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I envy you as well, Bianca.', 3: '21', 4: "You're making me blush.", 5: '30'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Envy me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Your intellect, your decisiveness, and your strength.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's just what a captain should be.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Then I'm also just being what a commandant should be.", 3: '25'}
{2: 'You should be proud of yourself sometimes, Bianca.', 3: '27'}
{2: "I'm proud of you, that I'm sure.", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm just being honest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: "Hey, it's your turn."}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: "The lucky draw! Weren't you listening to the host?"}
{2: 'Not at all...', 3: '36', 4: 'Draw first and ask questions later, I guess!', 5: '36'}
{2: "Sure, let's do it together!", 3: '39', 4: 'There are gifts!', 5: '39'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's outside my mission perimeter. I shouldn't be distracted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Come on!', 3: '41', 4: "Isn't protecting me part of your job?", 5: '41'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'A lucky draw has no direct impact on your safety.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It does, actually.', 3: '43', 4: 'Of course it does!', 5: '43'}
{2: 'My feelings could get hurt.', 3: '45', 4: 'My mood could get threatened.', 5: '45'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unfamiliar with this kind of conversation, Bianca is stunted, her eyes widened, speechless.'}
{3: 'After a brief moment of hesitation, Bianca decides to follow suit. She adjusts her hair before reaching into the raffle box in pink.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll take this one.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Holding her card solemnly, Bianca looks away and reads the number on her card.'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Alrighty then! Now that all the commandants have a card in their hands, I'll be announcing the lucky ones among you. Applause!"}
{3: 'Thus the men and women there applaud and cheer, the sound echoing and shaking the room.'}
{3: 'Bianca, a first-time participant, still acts calm and composed, but the slight redness on her ears reveals how she really feels.'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'So—our first lucky participant—'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Number 3!'}
{3: 'A petite, short-haired female commandant jumps in the crowd, waving at the host excitedly.'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Who is the lucky one that matches with this lovely commandant here?'}
{2: 'Host', 3: '—Number 12!'}
{3: 'As the host announces the number, a commandant in a hat is pushed to the front by his laughing peers on the other side of the room.'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Congratulations, commandants! Please approach backstage to register!'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "All your expenses during your one-day romance are on us, so enjoy your date! I can't wait to see the sparks between them!"}
{2: 'One-day romance...?', 3: '73', 4: "Isn't this just a normal lucky draw?!", 5: '73'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Now, our second pair!'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'It is—our dearest—'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Number 18!'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'And our dearest—Number 25! Congratulations!'}
